sentences: The Chair distributed a draft text compiling the EU and G-77/CHINA proposals on non-Annex I communications.
The group decided to devote its time to a question-and-answer session with the GEF and its implementing agencies.

Participants discussed inter alia: GEF's interpretation of 'agreed full costs,' the non-duplication principle endorsed by the GEF Council, the terms of agreement between the implementing agency and the recipient country, including terms for the disbursement of funds, GEF funding for adaptation measures and FCCC COP guidance to the GEF.
enb_long_title: Fifth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
